biotools.summary: It is a standalone full-interactive graphical suite for the pre-processing of gene expression data that aims at identify and remove sources of systematic and random variation in the measured data, other than differential expression. It integrates a variety of analytical tools that in some cases can be applied in any context. Other techniques require some specific conditions.

bioschemas.name: PreP
